地中海マルタ島への輸送作戦\nを実施する！これを阻止せん\nとする敵艦隊を撃破し: Conduct a transport operation to Malta in the Mediterranean Sea! Defeat the enemy fleet to stop them and complete the transport operation!
北方友軍への輸送作戦を実施\nする！敵基地航空及び艦隊に\nよる妨害が予想される: Carry out transport operations to allies in the north! Enemy hindrance is expected to occur. Break through the blocking fleet with elite forces!
北極海航路の大規模輸送船団\nを我が欧州派遣艦隊の総力で\n護衛し、同輸送作戦を: Escort a large convoy of ships in the Arctic Ocean with the full force of our European Fleet to ensure the success of the transport operation! Escort fleet, weigh anchor!
ルソン島沖/オルモック沖: Off the coast of Luzon/Ormoc Sea
台湾方面への輸送船団護衛を\n完遂後、比島方面の防衛強化\nのため多号作戦を実施: After completing the convoy escort to Taiwan, conduct Operation Ta to reinforce the defense of the Philippines, then seize the opportunity to conduct a counterattack!
接近中の敵艦隊を発見！\n 砲戦、魚雷戦……用意ッ！:
Approaching enemy fleet spotted!
Ready... the guns and torpedoes!
敵編隊接近中！対空戦闘用意ッ！:
Enemy squadron approaching!
Ready for anti-air combat!
目的地到着……船団入港準備！:
We've arrived at the destination...
The fleet is preparing to enter port!
反撃開始！各艦、突入用意――。:
Commence counterattack!
All ships, get ready to move in--.
多号作戦部隊、出撃！対空警戒を厳に！:
Operation Ta Force, sortie!
Maintain strict anti-aircraft alert!
春風船団、抜錨！対潜警戒を厳とせよ！:
Harukaze Convoy, weigh anchor!
Maintain strict anti-submarine alert!
海峡突入！対水上見張り、厳とせよ！戦闘用意ッ！:
Entering the strait! Keep a sharp lookout
for enemy ships! Battle stations!
